text: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy is a 2011 British-French spy movie. It was directed by Tomas Alfredson. The movie is based on the 1974 novel Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy by John le Carré. It is set in London in the early 1970s. The story follows the hunt for a Soviet double agent at the top of MI6. The novel had also been the basis of a 1979 BBC Television miniseries with Alec Guinness in the lead role. The 2011 movie stars Gary Oldman as George Smiley, with Colin Firth, Tom Hardy, John Hurt, Toby Jones, Mark Strong, Benedict Cumberbatch, Ciarán Hinds, David Dencik and Kathy Burke supporting.
